Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I am looking for a mod that lets asteroids hit planetary bodies. They don't have to leave craters, or leave any sign on the terrain that they ever hit, but it would be fun for RPing, if I could have to worry about my bases being hit by asteroids, and then evacuating/repairing any damage to the base.
Custom Asteroids can do that, tho you'll need to create the config that spawns the asteroids on a path towards whatever planet/moon you're looking to hit.
